name: Micro Tasker
description: Micro Tasker is a platform connecting buyers and workers for task-based projects. Buyers post tasks and purchase coins for payments, while workers complete tasks to earn coins. It features role-based access for admins, buyers, and workers.
challenges: Integrating real-time updates with WebSockets due to state management complexities.
Ensuring a responsive design that works seamlessly across all device sizes.
futurePlans: Implement an email notification system for all user actions.
Add a toast-based notification system for task deadlines.

name: Review Radar
description: Review Radar is a service review platform where users can explore services, read reviews, and submit their own. It includes user authentication, service search, and a responsive design for a seamless experience.
challenges: Gracefully handling errors from the backend.
Optimizing image loading to improve page render speed.
futurePlans: Add a detailed product review system with user feedback.
Integrate a recommendation engine based on user preferences.

name: Blue Eco Dive
description: Blue Eco Dive is an eco-adventure website for booking ocean dive experiences. It offers dynamic content about adventures, user authentication, and real-time expert consultation with a responsive, interactive UI.
challenges: Ensuring smooth, performant animations across different browsers.
Balancing a visually appealing design with accessibility standards.
futurePlans: Add a blog section for eco-tech articles.
Integrate a contact form with email notifications.
